task.summary: Default task
Added CRUD to itemShopDAO
Added character viewing into shop GUI
Added weapons viewing to the shop
Item Shop - added hero buying option. SQL tables to be corrected next
Item shop adds items to backpack, gold is working. SQL has been updated.
Cleaned the todo list, minor tweaks and refactors
Added equipment view button, added equipment upon spawning of heroes in the dungeon.
Added todos and empty classes for future dev
Added list of items and beginning of hero equipment selection screen
Dungeon GUI - changed the GUI so that it looks more similar to BG
Dungeon GUI - added "view map" button, switching between map and equipment now possible, viewing equipment still has bugs.
Dungeon GUI - added background to equipment view, added slots for equipment items.
Dungeon GUI - added minor changes to Equipment GUI, new packages added for images
Equipment GUI - new images added, some items refactored to use getters and setters, equipment view remodelled, equipment now views item images.
Equipment GUI - details of the item dragged on are being displayed, but on a new scene. Will have to improve it in the future.
Equipment GUI - Popup window updated on mouse enter. DragAndDrop in equipment started.
Equipment GUI - Dropping an equipment onto new slot does not update it. Have to repair
Equipment GUI - Dragging and Dropping the Items works
Equipment GUI - Upgraded shadow casting algorithm. Has to implement it to Pathfinder.java
Equipment GUI - Changed the main package name
Added some files after main package name changing
Dungeon GUI - added weapon damage to hit. Character Creator - popups with skill description on skills hover
Dungeon GUI - Added "current hp" field to Monsters and heroes, dealing damage now correctly subtracts currentHP
Equipment GUI - switching between character portraits now switches the equipment view
Added few todos
Dungeon GUI - added visibility checker
Dungeon GUI - UUID is now set and read from each unique monster in the dungeon
Dungeon GUI - Changed the view of a dungeon (displaying frame is now smaller and dungeon is more compact)
Dungeon GUI - refactor: extracted the console to a separate class
Dungeon GUI - refactor: extracted the Dungeon Image Library class
Dungeon GUI - refactor: extracted the Hero Manager Class
Dungeon console - started the initiative tracker
Dungeon console - initiative tracker works, but updates too often.
Dungeon console - small updates on the visibility checker. Visibility checker refactor incoming.
Dungeon console - Initiative is now rolled only at meeting the monsters
Dungeon console - First take on buffered images
Dungeon GUI - animations on HeroClick, Monster death event now updates the icon (but then it gets overwritten by map graphics event), animation on monster hit.
Dungeon GUI - animations on monster miss is now different from monster hit, skull image is now repaired and remains on the monster after map graphics update.
Dungeon GUI - Initiative Tracker now resets on last monster kill in the room.
Dungeon - attacks now have range and clicking an attack shows the available range. Unlocking attacks to be done next.
Dungeon - ranged attacks are now working correctly
Dungeon - rooms are now revealed in a more consistent manner. Recursive distance check has better call and can now be called only once.
Added skill icons and moved skill icon todo element to character creation
Character Creator GUI - added skill icon selector to Character Creator. Minor refactoring of methods in the class
Character Creator GUI - Skill icons are now being added and read into/from HDD.
Character Creator GUI - New skill icons, small improvements to field validation, better viewing of hero icons and skill icons upon selection.
MonsterAI - new class, added some ToDos
MonsterAI - validation of fields in character creator repaired
HeroClassInformation - added a hero class information factory with class name as a constructor's parameter, added weapon and armor proficiencies to hero class information.
